text:
He's able, He's able,

I know He's able,

| know my Lord is able

to carry me through (2)

He heals the broken-hearted
And sets the captive free

He makes the lame to walk again
And cause the blind to see.
For He's able, He's able!
Praise God! He's able!

| know my Lord is able

To carry me through.
